long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension that with a gamified map that allow users to plant real trees for free. 
When you open a new browser tab - we place ads and this is how we fund the tree planting forestation. 
We also placed a additonal search bar, the more your search the more trees you plant.
You can track the location of the trees planted, the amount of trees planted and even having an authentic certificate from Tree-Nation.com organization for the reforestation contribution you made to earth. Thats how you become an Earth Hero.
https://earthhero.io/privacy-policy
